com.github.codeteapot.jmibeans.port

Interface MachineManager


  • public interface MachineManager
    Management of known machines from the point of view of the platform port.

    The platform adapter is responsible for passing the instance associated with the port in the call to PlatformAdapter.listen(PlatformPort).

    See Also:
    PlatformPort.listen(MachineManager)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void accept(MachineId id, MachineLink link)
      Let the platform accept the machine with the specified identifier and for the associated port.
      void forget(MachineId id)
      Let the port forget the machine with the specified identifier, for the associated port.

    • Method Detail

      • accept

        void accept(MachineId id,
            MachineLink link)
        Let the platform accept the machine with the specified identifier and for the associated port.
        Parameters:
        id - The machine identifier in the underlying infrastructure of the port.
        link - Link to the underlying infrastructure of the port.

      • forget

        void forget(MachineId id)
        Let the port forget the machine with the specified identifier, for the associated port.
        Parameters:
        id - The machine identifier in the underlying infrastructure of the port.
